message.body: if i do a little bit of grocery shopping today, would you be down to back me?
thanks! i have to bake for a club meeting tomorrow. also i'm out of yogurt, so clearly it's urgent, haha.
Gotta watch out for number one!
You are number one. I an riding.
Okie doke. Did you go to publix? I did yesterday and it seemed like every product i ever buy that has chocolate in it was on a buy one get one. Also about a 32 dollar tab but i had 23 in savings!
nice! no, i was at kroger. my savings was not great but that's because the counter lady was not putting my coupons in correctly.
Minimum wage probably. They get what they pay for.
